arts.sum: Real Madrid are preparing for one of their most daunting European tests yet, which is a trip to Anfield to face Liverpool in the UEFA Champions League group stage. arts.ttl: Real Madrid pay tribute to Diogo Jota ahead of Champions League tie with Liverpool
arts.sum: Ahead of their clash with Liverpool on Tuesday night, a delegation from Real Madrid attended Diogo Jota’s memorial to pay tribute to the deceased forward and his brother, Andre. The pair tragically passed away in June during a car accident in Zamora, in the North-West of Spain. arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold sums up Liverpool feelings in one word before Real Madrid clash

arts.ttl: “Always nice” – Liverpool midfielder’s father asked about Real Madrid links
arts.sum: Liverpool host Real Madrid in the Champions League at Anfield later today. Ahead of this clash, Tuesday’s edition of AS has published an interview with Liverpool star Alexis Mac Allister’s father, Carlos. Over the years, the Liverpool player has been linked to Real Madrid but there weren’t any concrete developments. arts.sum: Liverpool host Real Madrid on Tuesday for a crucial Champions League showdown, desperately needing to build on their weekend victory. A 2-0 win over Aston Villa finally ended a dreadful four-game losing streak in the Premier League. Now, the Reds must carry that momentum onto the European stage.
